description: 2nd Tier of Process Clasification Frameworks called Process Group
3rd Tier of Process Clasification Frameworks called Process
4th Tier of Process Clasification Frameworks called Activity
5th Tier of Process Clasification Frameworks called Task, this is the start for each process workflow. Consist of an arrangement of workpackages to produce an outcome
Part of process workflow. Consist of an arrangement of 1 or more tasks and if any, asset item, to to be completed by a single defined job role
Part of process workflow. A usually assigned piece of work often to be finished within a certain time
